subject: LIVE: v1.13.17 Now in PROD - Please Test
body:
## v1.13.17 DEPLOYED TO PROD

Just merged DEVL → TEST → PROD.

## Test Now:
```bash
# Version check
curl 'https://calendarbeaf-prod.azurewebsites.net/api/health'
# Expected: {"version":"1.13.17"...}

# Category filter test (Practicas)
curl 'https://calendarbeaf-prod.azurewebsites.net/api/events?appId=1&start=2026-01-06&end=2026-01-12&categoryId=66c4d370a87a956db06c49ea&active=true'
```

Please confirm category filter returns events.

-- Fulton
